definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a bird of prey, possibly kite (Vulgate Saad. Bo:Hieroz. ii. 191 Di Le 11:14; Aram. [[דַּיְתָא]], dayto0; NH [[דַּיׇּה]] of diff. birds of prey; name prob. fr. flying, swooping), Le 11:14 forbidden as food; cf. also De 14:13 [[וְהָרָאָה ואת־הָאַיׇּה והַדַּיׇּה]], where for [[הראה]] rd. [[הַדָּאָה]] & del. [[הַדַּיׇּה]]; so Sam LXX; cf. Di l. c.
